title: Quick Tip
message1: Reach exactly zero by finishing on a double.
message2: Long-press any number to score doubles and trebles.

title: Quick Tip
message1: Reach exactly zero by finishing on a double.
message2: Long-press any number to score doubles and trebles.

title: Hit or Get Chopped
message1: Hit the target with at least one dart or your score gets halved!
message2: Long-press any number to score doubles and trebles.

title: Become a Killer
message1: Hit your own double first to become a killer. Then hit your opponentsâ€™ numbers to take their lives.
message2: Long-press any number to score doubles and trebles.

title: Beat the High Score
message1: Beat the current high score or lose a life.
message2: Long-press any number to score doubles and trebles.

title: Avoid Elimination
message1: The player with the lowest score at the end of each round loses a life.
message2: Long-press any number to score doubles and trebles.

title: Score Runs & Take Wickets
message1: Batters score runs on 15-20 and bull. Bowlers take wickets by hitting the bull.
message2: Long-press any number to score doubles and trebles.
